A characteristic of X-linked inheritance is that fathers cannot pass X-linked traits to their sons.",GHR,X-linked severe combined immunodeficiency
What are the treatments for X-linked severe combined immunodeficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of X-linked SCID:  - Baby's First Test: Severe Combined Immunodeficiency
